name: Inspired Crew
desc: The crew is especially motivated, all enjoying the freedoms granted by the Alliance. During the first 60 seconds of combat, grants %s/%s/%s/%s ECM rating, depending on this ship's hull size. The bonus will gradually go down until it reaches 0 after 60 seconds as the crew sees the harsh reality of battle.
short: Increases your ECM rating for the first 60 seconds of combat.

name: Turbo Mount
desc: The ship is equipped with a single enhanced Turbo Mount.
short: The ship is equipped with a single enhanced Turbo Mount.

name: Retinator Core
desc: Used by Retinator Drone. This text should not be visible to the player.

name: Makeshift Ground Support Package
desc: A hastily built package of close support weapons and counter-measures for ground defenses. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet.
